item.description:
This is the last weekend to view "Treasures from the Forbidden City" at the Peabody Essex Museum. Please check with your library to see if they have passes available for discounted admissions.

see link for more info on exhibit: http://www.pem.org/ex...

We will meet at PEM in the front entrance and then grab a quick bite @ A&J Artisan Bakers, 48 Central St. The bakery is a block away from PEM.

There is a parking lot directly across from PEM. Please plan extra time to find parking and be on time.

If you need a ride or can provide a ride - please indicate that in your RSVP. Carpooling will be recommended. Members may contact each other via email to arrange carpools. We will do our best to arrange rides as well. You can also get there by commuter rail

Event has been changed to Sunday, Jan 9
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the PEM main entrance (outside the Gift Shop on your right)

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: PEM in Salem: Treasures from the Forbidden City
